start.description: Checks if the bot is running or not

greet.usage: /greet <username or id> ; or reply to a message

help.description: Provides the user with a list of commands or help with a certain command

essentials.description: Command to list tools from essentials bot

purge.usage: /purge <number of messages from the last message or reply to a message>

kick.usage: /kick <username or id> ; or reply to a message

ikick.usage: /ikick <userID1, userID2,... ; or reply to a message containing userIDs
ikick.description: kicks all the users with the provided userIDs at once

dkick.description: Kicks the replied user and deletes the replied message

ban.usage: /ban <username or id> : or reply to message

dban.description: Bans the replied user and deletes the replied message

iban.usage: /iban <userID1, userID2,...> ; or reply to a message containing userIDs
iban.description: Bans all the users with the provided userIDs at once

tban.usage: /tban <username/ID> <time : 3d 1h 2m 8s> ; username/ID is not required when replying to a message
tban.description: Bans a user or bot for a given time

prefix.description: sets a unique prefix for all commands and avoids triggering other bots
